item.title: About
item.description: Kubeconform is a Kubernetes manifests validation tool. Build it into your CI to validate your Kubernetes configuration! It is inspired by, contains code from and is designed to stay close to Kubeval, but with the following improvements: high performance: will validate & download manifests over multiple routines, caching downloaded files in memory configurable list of remote, or local schemas locations, enabling validating Kubernetes custom resources (CRDs) and offline validation capabilities uses by default a self-updating fork of the schemas registry maintained by the kubernetes-json-schema project - which guarantees up-to-date schemas for all recent versions of Kubernetes.
